reviewtext: i bought this lens so i coulld take picture of performers up on stage or of people playing sports, my problem with it was that unless you are using a tripod and a remote there was no way to operate this lens at its maximum focal poitn without blurryness on the picture caused by even slight movement of the camera such as pressing the shutter button, i  would recommend people pay a little extra for the canon 55-250mm with IS, which prevents camera shake and makes shots that much easier
summary: good quality missing and important feature
